description: Stomatitis is an inflammation of the mucous lining inside the mouth, which can result in painful sores or ulcers.
possible causes: Irritants (such as tobacco, alcohol, or spicy foods)
symptoms: Painful sores or ulcers in the mouth
treatments: Pain relief medications (such as acetaminophen or ibuprofen)
Topical treatments (such as mouth rinses or gels)
